feed.title: Manyfold Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.59.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix account edit form by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1978
  • Allow access to user settings in demo mode by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1980

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • More secure password requirements and email validation with devise-security by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1979

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.59.0...v0.59.1

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.60.0
entry.content:
In this release, Manyfold takes a step inside your files to make sure they're printable! During scan, we look at the mesh structure of OBJ and STL files and make sure they don't have any holes. If they do, we'll raise a Problem so you can investigate further.

Note that this is quite a slow process, so it's not enabled by default. You can turn it on in settings, but even then it won't automatically do it for all the content you've already got. It just analyses new files, or existing files that have changed on since they were last looked at. If you have a pre-existing model you want to check, you can use the new "rescan" button on the model page to start it off.

Also, for you sysadmins, you can now specify your database settings using multiple different variables. Instead of setting DATABASE_URL, if you like, you can set the separate parts with DATABASE_USER, DATABASE_PASSWORD, DATABASE_HOST, and DATABASE_NAME.

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Check for non-manifold mesh errors by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1981
  • Add a button to rescan an individual model by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2003
  • Allow for modular setting of database connection string by @aneurinprice in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1997

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix incorrect checks for open registrations by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1992
  • Don't treat files without digests as duplicates by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2001
  • Fix incomplete model rescan jobs by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2007
  • Better failure handling for background scan jobs by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2011
  • Don't show nested model list in wrong places by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2013
  • Fix occasionally invalid default admin password by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2012
  • Fix docker database vars (alpine uses ash, not bash) by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2015
  • Fix potential error when migrating admin user first use token by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2016
  • Use default problem severities if setting isn't available by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2019
  • Fix incorrect condition for manifold checks by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2023

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Refactor default severity fallback to be more DRY by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1993
  • Translation updates for PL and FR by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2004
  • Reorganise analysis jobs into their own namespace by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2008
  • Temporarily disable inside-out check while we debug by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2009
  • Handle NaN errors during mesh loading by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2018
  • Make manifold check optional by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2022

New Contributors

  • @aneurinprice made their first contribution in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1997

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.59.1...v0.60.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.61.0
entry.content:
This release brings the ability for your users to recover their forgotten passwords, and stay logged in between browser sessions. The speed of the mesh analysis jobs has also roughly doubled, which makes detecting those holes a bit less expensive.

In order to enable password recovery, you'll need to set up email delivery, which needs a bunch of new environment variables:

Required:

  • PUBLIC_HOSTNAME: the public hostname (e.g. try.manyfold.app), used for links in emails
  • SMTP_SERVER: an SMTP server that can be used to send email
  • SMTP_USERNAME: username for the SMTP server
  • SMTP_PASSWORD: password for the SMTP server

Optional:

  • PUBLIC_PORT: if the service isn't on a standard port, specify it here. Also used for the links in the emails.
  • SMTP_FROM_ADDRESS: The email address that mail should be sent from. Defaults to notifications@{PUBLIC_HOSTNAME} if not specified.

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Add "remember me" option at login by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2027
  • Add ability to recover lost passwords by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2030

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Optimise STL loader by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2026

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.60.0...v0.61.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.62.0
entry.content:
The features in this little release weren't on the roadmap; think of this as more of a weekend bonus! Images in a model are now shown in a carousel at the top of the page, with the individual 3d files further down. Also, the bulk editor doesn't include images any more (because they didn't have anything to edit).

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Show images in a carousel above models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2033
  • Only list 3d files in bulk editor by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2035

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Translation updates (DE & PL) by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2034

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.61.0...v0.62.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.63.0
entry.content:
Another big feature release this time! Now you can convert inefficient STL and OBJ files to 3MF! For ASCII STLs, there's about a 95% space saving, and it's 50% for OBJ. So, if your disk is creaking at the seams, maybe some conversion is in order!

And, in order to see what's happening with conversions (and why they sometimes fail), there's now a nicer activity log which shows recent background jobs and what they've been doing.

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Convert STL and OBJ files to 3MF by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2041
  • Add a friendly activity log showing background tasks and results by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2056

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Check library paths are correct on case-preserving filesystems by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2054
  • ignore errors thrown by settings cache clear by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2059
  • Pluralize footer model names correctly by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2063
  • Fixes to 3MF conversion by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2044
  • Fix bulk editing bugs by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2062

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Change to Sidekiq to run background jobs by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2051
  • Remove job clearing in Docker start - not needed any more by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2052
  • Remove production prefix for queue names by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2053
  • add sidekiq-failures gem to track keep details of failed jobs by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2055
  • Add job progress reporting by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2057
  • Paginate activities with Kaminari by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2058
  • Remove extraneous directories when uploading archives by @james-harder in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2047
  • Update PL & FR Translations by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2064

New Contributors

  • @james-harder made their first contribution in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2047

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.62.0...v0.63.0
